about_the_game:
Bakso Simulator is back! Get ready to rebuild your Bakso Empire with new gameplay mechanics! Encounter both familiar and new faces, explore larger areas, and more!

Follow the footsteps of the legendary bakso seller, Rabas, as he ventures back to his peaceful hometown in the Indonesian countryside. Inheriting a substantial fortune from his late father, Rabas embarks on a new chapter, filled with both challenges and opportunities.

Features :

  • Discover new areas set in a beautiful Indonesian village

  • A much improved decorating system where players are more free on where to place objects!

  • Make your bakso cart cooler and more efficient by customizing and upgrading it!

  • Manage your shop and buy supplies by utilizing your new laptop and smartphone!

  • Hire staffs to help you sell bakso and keep customers happy!

  • Use various tools to keep your shop safe and clean!

  • A brand new house for Rabas to relax and plan his day!

name: Bakso Simulator 2
short_description: The Sequel to Bakso Simulator with new gameplay, areas, characters, and more!
